channel.title: 508 objects come and go? what?
channel.description:
i loaded some 508 maps from deathlypvpz's client onto mine, and it worked. (only edge dumped atm)
This is what happends (before walking into a non loaded area / black area) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/15zima0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/142vc6d.png[/img]
This is what happends after walking into a non loaded area / black area and than walk back to edge.. the object shows... huh?..
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4owvl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fp8etv.png[/img]
correct me if im wrong, but i know for a fact those are atleast 474 objects.

item.title: 508 objects come and go? what?
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

The floor of the edgeville bank points to 474, so yea. You have them loading incorrectly though. Thats probably your problem.

im loading it straight from the cache using the same way that the god war maps are being loaded

also

Read full topic
